name: The Wizarding Test
description:
The Wizarding Test is small open world game in which you craft spells and defeat all the wizards present on the island to pass the test and become a Wizard yourself!

Controls:

- Move: WASD

- Sprint: Left Shift 

- Jump: Spacebar

- Look: Mouse movement

- Cast spell 1: Left Mouse Click

- Cast spell 2: Right Mouse Click

- Open Spellcrafting: TAB

- Menu: ESC

Have fun!
